column5: Hack into the A/C controls and overlock the A/C unit. This causes it to overheat and the crankshaft to break.
Go to the RIT subreddit and begin posting fake messages that "RIT does not care about their students or well-beings"
Create and post a fake part for the University to buy.
File an FMS Request to have the crankshaft repaired
Alert the head of the department of the AC being broken and no response from your request.
Place an order for a new crankshaft to be manufactured
